ComicInfo.Summary:
Laura makes a major career move that puts her in a position to help Henry stop the flood of illegal Draxx into the city's poorest neighborhoods. But how she uses her newfound power could leave Henry's life in ruins. Meanwhile, a new insectile threat approaches Los Angeles.
